alert.note: Alert for Upper Tanana Valley and the Fortymile Country (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 28 at 3:20PM AKST until March 02 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM WEDNESDAY TO 6 PM AKST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow with reduced visibility expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 5 inches. Blowing snow reducing visibility to one half mile or less at times on Wednesday night and Thursday. Northwest winds 15 mph gusting to 25 mph. * WHERE...Along the Alaska Highway. * WHEN...From 6 AM Wednesday to 6 PM AKST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Snow drifts will form. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow is expected to develop Wednesday morning and continue into Thursday. Northwest winds 15 mph gusting to 25 mph are expected to develop Wednesday night and continue into Thursday causing blowing snow with reduced visibility Wednesday night and Thursday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Upper Tanana Valley and the Fortymile Country
